Name: VAR: Exterminate
About the game: VAR: Exterminate; Zombie rough-lite shooter that promises raw exhilarating horror with vast replayability. Designed exclusively for VR, immerse yourself in a post-apocalyptic city overrun by zombies Dictate your outcome Pick one of the 3 abilities offered to you at the beginning of every wave! Form your own ability tree and take on waves of relentless zombie attacks. Immersive zombie survival Eliminate zombies crawling all over the city, loot the undead to get money and chips to upgrade your weapons and equipment. Rich and high-quality game content There are 12 stages built for 2 Chapters. More will be added over time for free, so check back for more maps, stages, and chapters later. Pick your style Whether youâ€™re a gunslinging cowboy or a grenade launching trooper. Exterminate offers an array of weapons for you to take the undead out in style. Global Ranking Have what it takes to be a top dog? Challenge yourself against players over the world and fight out if you really have what it takes to be the toughest mercenary in the field! Only in VR VAR: Exterminate is a zombie shooter built exclusively for VR. Step into the midst of a zombie apocalypse and join the fight to take back what is rightfully ours!
